dashboard.label: Setting up and Troubleshooting InfoSec Cloud App

html.p: The InfoSec Cloud app uses standard Splunk Enterprise/Splunk Cloud functionality, and additional free Splunk add-ons and vizualisations.

html.h1: Before You Start Using InfoSec Cloud App
html.h2: At a minimum, you should have the following data in Splunk before you can use the app:

ul.li: Alerts and events from your cloud providers like AWS, Azure and GCP

html.p: Data you plan to use in the app must be mapped to the Spunk Common Information Model (CIM). Check whether add-ons you use for your data are CIM-compliant. If you are not sure, select Health from the main menu of the app to check what CIM comliant data you have in Splunk.
